appStore.keywords: IELTS, English test, speaking practice, writing assessment, AI tutor, test preparation, academic English, immigration, study abroad, language learning

description.short: World's ONLY AI-powered IELTS assessment platform with comprehensive, personalized feedback using official IELTS criteria.
description.full:
üéØ IELTS AI Prep - World's ONLY AI-Powered IELTS Assessment Platform

Prepare for IELTS with cutting-edge Google Gemini AI technology featuring comprehensive assessments with personalized improvement plans.

ü§ñ REVOLUTIONARY AI TECHNOLOGY

‚ú® KEY FEATURES

üí° PERFECT FOR
‚Ä¢ IELTS test preparation

Download now and experience the future of IELTS preparation!

inAppPurchases.description: 2 comprehensive AI-powered writing assessments with detailed feedback, sample improvements, and personalized study plans
2 full AI conversation-based speaking assessments with Maya, including personalized improvement plans and practice schedules
2 complete IELTS mock tests including Listening, Reading, Writing (with audio recordings), and Speaking with comprehensive AI feedback

appStore.reviewNotes: This app requires in-app purchases to access assessment features. The AI-powered assessments use Google Cloud Platform (Gemini 2.5 Flash Live API and Gemini 2.5 Flash) for processing. Cross-platform functionality allows users to access purchased content on both mobile and web (www.ieltsaiprep.com). All assessments provide comprehensive feedback based on official IELTS band descriptors with personalized improvement plans.
